meanings.definition: Distelfinks: plural noun, a type of bird often depicted in Pennsylvania Dutch folk art.
meanings.sent1: In the painting, there were two colorful distelfinks sitting on a branch.
meanings.sent2: The distelfinks chirped happily in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to imitate the distelfinks' song.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as cheerful as the song of distelfinks.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the beauty of the distelfinks with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: Distelfinks: verb, to paint or decorate with images of distelfinks.
meanings.sent1: She decided to distelfinks her wooden box as a gift.
meanings.sent2: The children loved to distelfinks their Easter eggs.
meanings.sent3: He promised to distelfinks the walls with magical creatures.
meanings.sent4: The muralist will distelfinks the entire town square with his art.
meanings.sent5: The art class learned how to distelfinks their pottery with intricate designs.

meanings.definition: Distelfinks: adjective, relating to or characteristic of distelfinks.
meanings.sent1: The distelfinks pattern on the quilt was charming.
meanings.sent2: Her dress had a lovely distelfinks embroidery.
meanings.sent3: The room was filled with distelfinks decorations for the festival.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a distelfinks paradise with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The house had a warm, distelfinks atmosphere that welcomed everyone.
